MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the KY4 postcode area of Cowdenbeath. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 11:19pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Torbeath Gardens substation and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:57pm on 18th January
